title: Chat Bubble Chronology Only Updates After Logout
body:
Image above shows the flow of the chat bubbles before and after a logout of the app.

The After image shows the correct chronology of the conversation. However as the chat is taking place the assortment of bubbles is fairly unpredictable. They will often occur above where you are chatting.

Can confirm that switching windows, closing the app or entering menus (such as settings) will not force the update. Have only found the correct chronology after re-logging in to the app.
